description: Networks, signals and systems form the basic foundations of electrical engineering. Any electrical engineering product handles signals using electrical networks and circuits, which are called systems. Having a good understanding of signals and their time/frequency domain characterization is an absolute must for any electrical engineer. This course is a basic introduction to discrete and continuous-time signals, Fourier series, Fourier transforms and Laplace transforms.
title: Networks and Systems
instructors: C. S. Ramalingam and V. G. K. Murti
institution_name: IIT ( Indian Institute of Technology Madras)
